instruments.title: Fender Stratocaster
instruments.description: One of the most iconic guitars, known for its versatile sound and classic double-cutaway design.

instruments.title: Gibson Les Paul
instruments.description: Recognized for its solid construction, exceptional sustain, and powerful tone, especially suitable for rock and blues.

instruments.title: Ibanez RG550
instruments.description: A popular guitar among metal guitarists, known for its fast playability and powerful pickups.

instruments.title: PRS SE Custom 24
instruments.description: Combines PRS's elegant design with a more affordable price, offering tonal versatility and playing comfort.

instruments.title: Epiphone Les Paul Standard
instruments.description: An affordable alternative to the Gibson Les Paul, maintaining many classic features.

instruments.title: Jackson Soloist SL2
instruments.description: Designed to meet the demands of metal guitarists, with a unique body design and high-gain pickups.

instruments.title: Gretsch G2622 Streamliner
instruments.description: A semi-hollow guitar with a distinctive sound and retro style, great for styles like rockabilly and jazz.

instruments.title: ESP LTD EC-1000
instruments.description: A guitar with a sleek finish, suitable for a variety of musical styles, especially rock and metal.

instruments.title: Taylor T5z Classic
instruments.description: A hybrid acoustic/electric guitar, offering tonal versatility for musicians seeking a range of sounds.
